description:
Paraffin base wax designed for speed and protection in warmer, wetter now conditions

  • Suits snow from -2 to 0°C
  • Excellent universal base, melting point of 48°C is good for saturation and works with polyethylene bases
  • Apply with a waxing iron at 110-120°C
  • 250g
name: Maplus X Soft Base Race Paraffin - Unisex
